dct_title_s: Royaume de Bengale, et les Rivieres qui se jettent dans le Gange : suivant la deácouverte des portugais
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:4,500,000 ; (E 85°58'00"--E 94°08'00"/N 27°00'00"--N 21°00'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Date from previous call number. In lower right:"53." In Dutch and French.
16 x 22 centimeters, on sheet 37 x 46 centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dct_publisher_sm: Pieter van der Aa; Leiden, Netherlands
dcat_keyword_sm: West Bengal (India) Maps Early Works to 1800
